TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because it didn't have two daughters.

If water is wet and sand is dry, is quicksand both?

 

EDIT:  Fresh pagination

Edited April 16 by Scarecrow71

The quicksand is too quick to catch it and ask.

Why not quixand?

x is much briefer than cks

Because “quick” is better than “quix”. 
 

how do space marines sleep? Do they sleep?

Space Marines sleep in spaces. They sleep if they are not awake.

Does an orange on the green feel blue because the yellow Sun is making it red?

An orange on the green doesn't feel blues, because it's a replacement of the McDonald's after its retiring.

Spoiler

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vkusno_i_tochka

 

When the orange are green, what color is orange?

orang.

why does the empire have a weakness in the Death Star? Are they stupid?

Death Star is not theirs. They build triangles, it's a sphere. They just found it.

Does the light sabre beam reflect in a mirror?

Only back at its user.

Stadiums are filled with seats, but those seats are referred to as the stands.  Do we sit or stand?

Everyone should be standing, but they are lazy now and so sit.

Why are cricket pitches not black and oily or cantered at an angle?

Because it's an insect. The insects do everything unlike the humans do.

What is being the beer?

A person with a bubbly personality and brown or green glasses being drunk.

If beer was Egyptian bread, then what other solid food did they liquidise?

They were milking the rocky sphinxes.

Why did they first send to the Moon a musician?

Because they were terrible and sound doesn't travel in a vacuum.

Can you think without a shower?

Without a shower I think about shower.

Why do they call "SHOWer" the place where they hide?

Because originally they didn't hide and showed it all.

If you put a show on can you showoff?

yes, it's commonly known as ending a show.

Can one bounce to escape velocity?

Yes, on the Mun.

What makes you happy?

Moar boosters.

Why does Jeb like boosters so much?

Because they say "Boo!"

Are ion thrusters "pew!"sters?

Only when in Church.

Where can I get 100 weather balloons, some straps and a deck chair?

Weird Al’s Hardware Store.

How much to buy beachfront property on Mars?

None - It doesn't exist because Mars is dry.

How many kerbals standing side-by-side would it take to make a circle around Kerbin?

We will never know, all of the Kerbals are stranded on Duna.

Would it be possible for an AC-130 to shoot another aircraft out of the sky with its 105 mm cannon?

Anything is possible.

Is anything impossible?

NO.

Is that a bird or a plane?
